sentences.sContent: ...the monument was Stone Age or Neolithic.
sentences.sCn: ...该纪念碑是属于石器时代或新石器时代的。

remMethod.val: neo(新的) + lith(石头) + ic → 新石头的 → 新石器时代的

trans.tranOther: Neolithic is used to describe things relating to the period when people had started farming but still used stone for making weapons and tools
